name: Icons
description: Svg icons based on an open source icon set with 225 marks from ionic.

options.name: name
options.description: A name of the icon. For more icons please refer to https://useiconic.com/open/

options.name: background
options.description: A name of the background icon. It will be stacked behind the main icon. It supports circle-outline and circle-fill background icons.

options.name: align
options.description: Adds extra padding on the left/right of the icon.

options.name: size
options.description: Size of the icon. 'sm' starts at 1em and increments by 0.2em for other sizes.

options.name: text
options.description: To place custom text above the icon. Works well with background icon `circle-fill` and supports up to two characters.

options.name: path
options.description: It allows you to specify a path to your own svg sprite.
